snippet.title: Lords and Villeins - The World Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Lords and Villeins has received its first major Early Access Content Update!

It brings new zones, structures and professions, new trade opportunities, new animals, the ability of your villeins to form relationships and fight, but, BUT, most importantly... CATS AND DOGS! 

Full list of features is available at https://bit.ly/LaV_World_Update

Grow dynasties of medieval families and see them evolve and interact as you build their homes, in this lighthearted pixel art city-building strategy simulation. Expand your production chain and influence the daily lives of your villagers to craft a unique story of your settlement. Lords & Villeins is available now in Early Access!

Get the game now on:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287530/Lords__Villeins/
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/lords_and_villeins
EGS -  https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/lords-and-villeins-746931

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#PixelArt #LifeSim
